articles.title: Thousands evacuated as Japan's biggest fire in decades continues to burn

articles.description: A looming deadline for people to plug NI gaps, to ensure they get the full state pension, has been eased.
articles.title: State pension: Deadline for National Insurance top-ups softened

articles.title: Scottish painter Jack Vettriano dies aged 73

articles.description: Those currently earning less than £123 a week are currently not eligible for sick pay.
articles.title: Sick pay: Low paid workers to get 80% of salary when ill

articles.description: Thousands of pounds were stolen after EDF gave his mobile number to scammers, says Stephen.
articles.title: Fraudsters stole £40k from Hertfordshire man via phone scam

articles.description: Ex-Fifa head Sepp Blatter and French football great Michel Platini were cleared in 2022, but prosecutors appealed.
articles.title: Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini back in Swiss court in Fifa fraud case

articles.description: Ministers want to move to a "commonhold" system where flat-owners own a share of their buildings.

articles.description: The TV presenter left the show in 2021 over his controversial comments about the Duchess of Sussex.
